author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:

See https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43273
This backport only affect R-hadron simulation.



#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43273
title: [13_3_X SIM] Allowed MT mode for RHStopTracer of R-hadron simulation
